issue.title: Rendering errors when running headless on remote machine

content.raw:
Hey Sarah,

Yes, let’s do that. Please go ahead and make another issue \(enhancement\) for the sensor data not to require a display.

Currently \(for the tunnel circuit\), headless just means that it doesn't require a GUI to load the models. However, the sensor data still requires a display \(even if you use headless\).
content.html:
Hey Sarah,

Yes, let’s do that. Please go ahead and make another issue (enhancement) for the sensor data not to require a display.

Currently (for the tunnel circuit), headless just means that it doesn't require a GUI to load the models. However, the sensor data still requires a display (even if you use headless).
